seo.title: Camping Corniglia 2025 | Campsites Cinque Terre
seo.description: Camping options near Corniglia. No camping in the national park, but nearby campsites in Levanto and surrounding areas.

body.title: Camping near Corniglia
body.subtitle: No camping allowed in Cinque Terre National Park. Nearest campsites are in Levanto, 15 minutes north by train.

features.title: No Park Camping
features.description: Camping strictly forbidden in Cinque Terre National Park. Heavy fines for violations.

features.title: Levanto Campsites
features.description: Several campsites in Levanto, 15 minutes north by train. Easy day trips to all villages.

features.title: Campsite Features
features.description: Modern facilities with pools, restaurants, and beach access. Bungalows available besides tent sites.

features.title: Budget-Friendly
features.description: Camping is most affordable accommodation option for Cinque Terre visits.

features.title: Beach Access
features.description: Levanto campsites near the beach. Larger sandy beach than any Cinque Terre village.

features.title: Alternative: Hostels
features.description: Consider hostels in villages for budget accommodation that's closer to attractions.
